channel.title: Comments on: Desmond RegaMaster Marquis Promada

item.title: By: ’99 OEM Sideskirts – not4kds
item.dc:creator: ’99 OEM Sideskirts – not4kds
item.description: […] the sideskirts have gone up due to their increased scarcity. Luckily, I was contacted by a fellow RegaMaster aficionado, named Tommy, who sold me a clean set he had been storing at a fair price. They happened […]
item.content:encoded: […] the sideskirts have gone up due to their increased scarcity. Luckily, I was contacted by a fellow RegaMaster aficionado, named Tommy, who sold me a clean set he had been storing at a fair price. They happened […]

item.title: By: Hong
item.dc:creator: Hong
item.description:
So... All Regamaster's have same Center Bore ?
I'm kinda in market to purchase 5x100 set but infomations are really limited...
60.1 is my guess but all the same?
item.content:encoded:
So… All Regamaster’s have same Center Bore ?

I’m kinda in market to purchase 5×100 set but infomations are really limited…

60.1 is my guess but all the same?

item.title: By: Kent
item.dc:creator: Kent
item.description: Gosh darn it sir, this set is flawless now. Squared setup of Regamasters? Now you gotta bless those wheels with vodka. lol
item.content:encoded: Gosh darn it sir, this set is flawless now. Squared setup of Regamasters? Now you gotta bless those wheels with vodka. lol

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2013/01/desmond-regamaster-marquis-promada/#comment-52059">Jay Bryan</a>.
You said it... I think the more extra steps you take, the more you separate yourself from the average.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jay Bryan.

You said it… I think the more extra steps you take, the more you separate yourself from the average.

item.title: By: Jay Bryan
item.dc:creator: Jay Bryan
item.description: Going the extra mile on something like this will always make a build more special.
item.content:encoded: Going the extra mile on something like this will always make a build more special.
